DOC.criteria: 1 . Male subject , age 21 year point screen participation . 2 . Subjects able give voluntary , write informed consent participate clinical investigation consent obtain . 3 . Subjects , opinion clinical investigator , able understand clinical investigation cooperate investigational procedure willing return clinical centre require posttreatment followup . 4 . Subjects willing circumcised cultural reason . 5 . Subjects live site 's area . 6 . Subjects easily contact telephone . 7 . Subjects correctly speak correctly read English . 1 . Subjects , opinion investigator , exist condition would compromise participation followup study . 2 . Subjects circumcise ( i.e . subject foreskin unable cover entire glans without pull foreskin ) . 3 . Subjects disease indication circumcision : phimosis , paraphimosis , warts prepuce , torn tight frenulum . 4 . Subjects know drug alcohol abuser psychological disorder could affect followup care treatment outcomes . 5 . Subjects participate clinical study investigational product last 6 month . 6 . Subjects abnormal penile anatomy . 7 . Subjects currently involved injury litigation claim . 8 . Subjects penile disease lesion . 9 . Subjects clinical symptom sexually transmit infection . 10 . Subjects opportunistic infection . 11 . Subjects know diabetes , know allergy local anaesthesia know abnormal blood coagulation . 12 . Subjects whose penile circumference high ( > 3mm ) low ( < 3mm ) available circumcision tube . 13 . Subjects thick foreskin ( difference diameter cover glans uncovered glans > 5mm ) .
